names.english: drain the spleen and clear heat drink
names.commonEnglish: Drain the Spleen and Clear Heat Drink

actions: Clears Heat and clears the eyes.
Releases the Exterior and expels External Wind.
Drains Fire, detoxifies and calms ascending Liver Yang.
With Zhi Zi, powerfully clears and drains lurking Heat from the Lungs with fever, fullness in the chest, coughing with yellow sputum and epistaxis or hematemesis.
Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin, transforms Phlegm-Heat, drains Fire and Relieves toxicity.
Clears Heat, reduces Fire and eliminates irritability.
Clears Heat in the Qi Stage, drains Fire, relieves irritability and quenches thirst.
With Zhi Mu, for a high fever from Wind-Heat or Qi Stage Heat or Yang Ming Heat with irritability and extreme thirst.
Drains Fire, clears Heat and reduces Fire toxicity.
Clears Heat and drains Fire Nourishes Yin and moistens Dryness
Drains Fire and relieves Fire toxicity.
With Zhi Mu, for Yin Deficiency fever.
with Zhi Zi, resolves constraint and directs Qi downward for clearing Heat and Fire from the Liver channel.
Disperses Wind, clears Heat, calms the Liver, clears the eyes and detoxifies.
With Fang Feng, for Wind-Heat irritating the Exterior with slight chills, mild fever, headache and itchy eyes.

symptoms: Redness and swelling of the eye with a burning sensation
Pain is aggravated by exposure to Wind and Heat
Formation of pus in the eye
